info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:27AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SIOUX, EASTERN HETTINGER, WESTERN GRANT AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS COUNTIES THROUGH 400 AM MDT... At 327 AM MDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of New Leipzig to 16 miles southwest of Elgin to 4 miles northwest of Thunder Hawk. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... New Leipzig around 340 AM MDT. Elgin around 355 AM MDT. Morristown and Heart Butte Dam around 400 AM MDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Leith, Burt, Heil and Bentley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
